column1: Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence (100% online) MSc
column5: An interactive online MSc Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence from a university with leading teaching and research ratings, and superb student satisfaction scores.A FLEXIBLE ONLINE MASTERâ€™S GEARED TO CAREER SUCCESS IN A FAST-GROWING FIELDFrom 2019-2020, the global AI software market grew 54% year-on-year to $22.6 billion, with similarly impressive annual growth rates forecast for the coming years (Statista 2020). The online MSc Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence from Keele University has been carefully designed to develop the knowledge and skills required to take advantage of the exponential growth of this sector and excel in artificial intelligence careers.
